Info.Title: Invictus
Info.Actors: Morgan Freeman, Matt Damon, Tony Kgoroge, Patrick Mofokeng
Info.Plot: Nelson Mandela, in his first term as President of South Africa, initiates a unique venture to unite the Apartheid-torn land: enlist the national rugby team on a mission to win the 1995 Rugby World Cup.
Info.Language: English, Afrikaans, Maori, Zulu, Xhosa, Southern Sotho
Info.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 11 wins & 35 nominations.
